content: अभिनयः {@--1@} Acting, gesticulation, any theatrical action (expressive of some sentiment, passion &c. by look, gesture, posture &c.); नृत्याभिनयक्रियाच्युतं <ls>Ku. 5. 79</ls>; अभिनयान् परिचेतुमिवोद्यता <ls>R. 9. 33</ls>; नर्तकीरभिनयातिलंघिनीः <ls n="R.">19. 14</ls>; <ls>Ki. 10. 42.</ls> {@--2@} Dramatic representation, exhibition on the stage; ललिताभिनयं तमद्य भर्ता मरुतां द्रष्टुमनाः सलोकपालः <ls>V. 2. 18.</ls> <ls>S. D.</ls> thus defines and classifies अभिनयः-भवेदभिनयोऽवस्थानुकारः स चतुर्विधः . अंगिको वाचिकश्चैवमाहार्यः सात्त्विकस्तथा .. <ls n="S. D.">274</ls>, ‘acting is the imitation of condition’; it is of four kinds:-- (1) {%gestural%}, conveyed by bodily actions; (2) {%vocal%}, conveyed by words; (3) {%extraneous%}, conveyed by dress, ornaments, decoration &c.; (4) {%internal%}, conveyed by the manifestation of internal feelings such as perspiration, thrilling &c.
